entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (mtp_angry_meatlump_giver.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: Can you do something for me? I've noticed some of the Meatlumps here in the hideout are angry for some reason. Can you cheer them up for me?
entries.s_14: Excellent. You'll find them throughout the hideout. They just need some attention from you. Maybe a smile or a hug or something like that.
entries.s_18: Well now I think I might be angry...
entries.s_4: Wow, you actually did it. Thanks!
entries.s_6: Well, those angry Meatlumps won't cheer themselves up. What are you waiting for?
entries.s_8: Oh hi. Sorry, too many of the Meatlumps might still remember you from last time. Try back later.
